paper_abstract: The max-Lukasiewicz semiring is defined as the unit interval [0, 1] equipped with the arithmetics "a + b"= max(a, b) and "ab" = max(0, a + b-1). Linear algebra over this semiring can be developed in the usual way. We observe that any problem of the max-Lukasiewicz linear algebra can be equivalently formulated as a problem of the tropical (max-plus) linear algebra. Based on this equivalence, we develop a theory of the matrix powers and the eigenproblem over the max-Lukasiewicz semiring. (C) 2014 The Authors. Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: Tropical linear algebra with the Lukasiewicz T-norm
